description: Template for secrets.json - Copy this file to secrets.json and fill in actual values
note: secrets.json is gitignored and should never be committed

cloudflare_setup_instructions.step_1: Create KV namespace: npx wrangler kv:namespace create CACHE_KV
cloudflare_setup_instructions.step_2: Create R2 bucket: npx wrangler r2 bucket create autumnsgrove-images
cloudflare_setup_instructions.step_3: Create D1 database: npx wrangler d1 create autumnsgrove-git-stats
cloudflare_setup_instructions.step_4: Update wrangler.toml with the IDs from steps 1-3
cloudflare_setup_instructions.step_5: Deploy secrets: npx wrangler secret put GITHUB_TOKEN && npx wrangler secret put ANTHROPIC_API_KEY
cloudflare_setup_instructions.step_6: Connect R2 custom domain: Dashboard > R2 > bucket > Settings > Custom Domains

local_development.note: Create a .dev.vars file (gitignored) with these values for local dev
